item.title: Ad Auction Dashboard
item.description: Ad Auction Dashboard GitlabsðŸ”— This project involved working in a small team to create an Ad Auction Dashboard using JavaFX

item.title: Computer Vision
item.description: Hybrid Images GitlabsðŸ”— This coursework involved merging high and low frequencies from different images using Java and OpenIMAJ to create Hybrid images, where lower frequencies become more prominent at distance and higher frequencies at close range.

item.title: Distributed Systems and Networks
item.description: Java Sockets GitlabsðŸ”— This first coursework documents my experience of using Java Sockets to learn how to send messages using TCP and UDP, as well as file sending.
